name: Frog jumper (Joni Suojanen, DataBitz, Sesh, niclinfin, NoCabbageCasserole, R4iku)
name_original: Frog jumper (Joni Suojanen, DataBitz, Sesh, niclinfin, NoCabbageCasserole, R4iku)
description:
Like on Global Game Jam: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/frog-jumper-1

A Finnish Global Game Jam Game Kymenlaakso site in Kotka, created by team Unintelligent AI. The game is a simple 2d-platformer, where frog (you) tries to coordinate jumps to reach higher lengths of the world.  Theme was Roots.

Proven best on mobile or fullscreen pc.

Credits: 

Joni Suojanen - Game Designer / Character Artist

Ale Neppius - Game Designer / Environment Artist

Konsta Karttunen - UI Designer

Jimmy Plit - Lead Programmer

Aleksi Jokitalo - Sound Designer

Nicolas Lindell - Programmer

How to play:
Leap by clicking anywhere above the frog.

Click the playing area using your primary (left) mouse button, or tap if you have a touchscreen.

Objective: Climb as high as you can
